allow:
0x00000040 ADD_REACTIONS
0x00000400 VIEW_CHANNEL
0x00000800 SEND_MESSAGES
0x00010000 READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY
0x00020000 MENTION_EVERYONE
0x00040000 USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS
0x00100000 CONNECT
0x00200000 SPEAK
sum: 3607616

0x00000001
